messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: All drugs are now legal. As long as you give ol' cappy a cut.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Unidentified armed ship detected near the station.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Data theft signal detected, source registered on local gps units.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Tyron Jamal (Assistant)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">after the murdoius crimnal threw a glass bottle at a innocent police officer, tyron jamal was placed in jail for this inhuman crime, Crew please follow the captain&#39;s example in keeping the station safe. have a safe night</font>

messages.author: Tyron Jamal (Assistant)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">recent events on the station have rendered Adlen a Crimainal, however I belive he is a swell man and should be relived of his charges. He had helped me in setting up my buessness and I belive that a man like that would never commit a crime. however after a short chase the captian exploded. have a safe shift crew.</font>

messages.author: Tyron Jamal (Assistant)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">after a short vist to the medbay, I have found out it was flooded by monkies. I would recomand the station's crew interveined and sloved this issue. have a safe shift crew.</font>
